content.rendered:
Directed by Raj Kumar Gupta

Written by Nischay Kutt. Imran Manzoor. Ritesh Shah

Cast Ajay Devgn (Amay Patnaik). Ileana D’Cruz (Malini Patnaik). Saurabh Shukla (Rameshwar Singh). Amit Sial (Lallan Sudheer). Amit Bimrot (Satish Mishra). Gayathri Iyer (Mukta Yadav (as Gayathri)). Sheeba Chaddha (Prabha Singh). Geeta Agrawal Sharma (Reema Singh (as Geeta Agarwal)). Saanand Verma (Suraj Singh). Devas Dixit (Shashi). Sulagna Panigrahi (Tara). Ravi Khanvilkar (Rakesh Singh). Pravin Singh Sisodia (Anubhav Singh). Pushpa Joshi (Amma). Simran Nisha (Sushma). Surbhi Singh (Jaya (as Saurabhi Singh)). Prakash Bajpai (Ramu Kaka). Manju Shukla (Kaki). Ashok Lal (Dismissed IT Officer). Zia Ahmed Khan (Vijay Srivastava – Raid Witness). Aalok Sharad (Mithilesh Mani – Raid Witness). Flora Jacob (Prime Minister). R.C. Pathak (Chief Minister (as Rc Pathak)). Anil Rastogi (Raman Kumar – Finance Minister). Pankaj Dixit (PAC Commandent). Ram Raksha Singh (PAC Inspector). Ashwani Kumar (Photographer). Bhavya Parihar (Kid #1). Rubal Jain (Kid #2). Sneha Pandey (Kid #3). Aditi Jaiswal (Kid #4). Raju Pandey (Chartered Accountant). Suneel Kumar Sarin (Chartered Accountant). Prakhar Srivastav (Chartered Accountant (as Prakhar Srivastava)). Varun Tamta (Chartered Accountant). Neelabh Pandey (Amay’s Driver). Ikram Khan (Chief Minister’s PA). Kader Sheikh (Prime Minister’s PA). Mohd. Harum (MLA). Satya Prakash Mishra (MLA). Devendra Modi (MLA). Anand Prakash (MLA). Surendra Pratap Singh (MLA). Kamal Singh Yadav (Courtyard Club Manager). Bimal Sarkar (Informer). Vipin Kumar Singh (Informer). Dinesh Vishwakarma (Informer). Mohd. Afzal (White House IT Team). Vipin Agarwal (White House IT Team). Azhar Ali (White House IT Team). Pratibha Awasthy (White House IT Team). Sadhna Bajpai (White House IT Team). Natasha Bano (White House IT Team). Sunil Chaurasia (White House IT Team). Parul Kant (White House IT Team). Deepak Singh Mehra (White House IT Team). Avinash Shukla (White House IT Team). Naval Shukla (White House IT Team). Ajay Singh (White House IT Team). Nisha Singh (White House IT Team). Soni Singh (White House IT Team). Parshu Ram Verma (White House IT Team). Shailendra Kumar Choubey (Secretary to PM’s PA). Arafat Ahmed Ansari (PAC Guard). Durgesh Singh Chauhan (PAC Guard). Aditya Dubey (PAC Guard). Vishwanath Mishra (PAC Guard). Manish Kumar Pandey (PAC Guard). Ram Lakhan Pandey (PAC Guard). Om Prakash Shrivastava (PAC Guard). Prabhash Shrivastava (PAC Guard). Ankur Singh (PAC Guard). Chandra Harsh Singh (PAC Guard). Baba Khan (Rameshwar’s Lathait). Sushil Rastogi (Rameshwar’s Lathait). Amit Sahu (Rameshwar’s Lathait). Avinash Singh (Rameshwar’s Lathait). Jabbar Akram (IT Office Team Member). Sanjeev Bhattacharya (IT Office Team Member). Mahesh Chandra Deva (IT Office Team Member (as Mahesh Chandra)). Diwakar (IT Office Team Member). Shalini Dwivedi (IT Office Team Member). Archana Jain (IT Office Team Member). Kafeel (IT Office Team Member). Naaz Khan (IT Office Team Member). Brijesh Singh Rathore (IT Office Team Member). Anand Prakash Sharma (IT Office Team Member). Abdul Salam Siddiqui (IT Office Team Member). Ashutosh Singh (IT Office Team Member). Sanjeev Kumar Srivastava (IT Office Team Member). Saurabh Yadav (IT Office Team Member). Uday Vir Singh Yadav (D.I. Commissioner (as Udayvir Singh)) . Zohab Khan (PAC Guard (uncredited)). Mayank Kumar Mishra (Protester (uncredited)). Akash Pandey ((uncredited))

Languages Hindi

Producers Hanif Chunawala. Arun Singh Dikky. Sanjay Inamdar. Sanjeev Joshi. Hetvi Karia. Bhushan Kumar. Krishan Kumar. Gaurav Nanda. Abhishek Pathak. Kumar Mangat Pathak. Ravi Sarin. Vignesh Shetty. Tarlok Singh

Production Panorama Studio. Super Cassettes Industries Limited T-Series
